name: MuchoMucho: Heroes of the Dead
description:
Compete in real-time multiplayer
battles and control your hero in the
arena. Pick your favorite heroes, form troops and
discover spells!

• Dozens of unique heroes that you can control on the battlefield
• Collecting tons of cards and strategic deck building
• Deploy troops on the battlefield
• Loot and chest mechanic for upgrades
• Daily quests, tournaments and clans
• No pay to win mechanics!
• More heroes will be released soon



Dive deeper into the game as you are
the one to control your hero on the
battlefield

• Each hero has it’s unique style of
game play
• Unlock and upgrade heroes that
players feel attached to
• Collect weapons and spells and
equip your heroes
• Build synergy teams and play
interesting strategies
